Why are you laughing?\""},{"lineNumber":230920,"originalJapaneseLine":"「優しいんだね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're so kind...\""},{"lineNumber":230921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah.\""},{"lineNumber":230922,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミックスは鼻で笑った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix scoffed."},{"lineNumber":230923,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人を助ける職業に就いてるのよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I work in a profession that helps people,"},{"lineNumber":230924,"originalJapaneseLine":"　医者が優しいなんて当然でしょーが」","translatedEnglishLine":"so of course doctors are kind.\""},{"lineNumber":230925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、ミックスちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, Mix-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":230926,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おいこら、勝手にちゃん付けすんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, don’t just add '-chan' without permission.\""},{"lineNumber":230927,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、はいはい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah, yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":230928,"originalJapaneseLine":"「感謝の気持ちがあるんなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you really feel grateful,"},{"lineNumber":230929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと治ってあたしの手を煩わせないでよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"then get well quickly and don't trouble me.\""},{"lineNumber":230930,"originalJapaneseLine":"照れているわけでもないようだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"She didn't seem to be embarrassed."},{"lineNumber":230931,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミックスは淡々とそう言った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix said so calmly."},{"lineNumber":230932,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"…………\""},{"lineNumber":230933,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":230934,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぎろり。","translatedEnglishLine":"A sharp glare."},{"lineNumber":230935,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは睨まれてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were glared at."},{"lineNumber":230936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\""},{"lineNumber":230937,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはカルテでバーンと顔を殴られた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You were hit hard in the face with a medical chart."},{"lineNumber":230938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あによ？　なんか言った？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What? Did you say something?\""},{"lineNumber":230939,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら怒らせてしまったようだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems you've made her angry."},{"lineNumber":230940,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは首を横に振った。","translatedEnglishLine":"You shook your head."},{"lineNumber":230941,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ったく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief..."},{"lineNumber":230942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無駄に元気有り余ってるわね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You have an excess of pointless energy, don't you...?\""},{"lineNumber":230943,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、元気なら、それが何よりだけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, if you're energetic, that's the best thing after all.\""},{"lineNumber":230944,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふわりと、ちゃんと見ていなければ","translatedEnglishLine":"Softly, if you weren't looking carefully,"},{"lineNumber":230945,"originalJapaneseLine":"気づかないほどさりげなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"so subtly you'd hardly notice,"},{"lineNumber":230946,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミックスが微笑んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Mix smiled."},{"lineNumber":230947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえず二人とも今日は絶対安静。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, both of you must rest absolutely today."},{"lineNumber":230948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一日、大人しくしていること」","translatedEnglishLine":"Stay quiet and calm for one day.\""},{"lineNumber":230949,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、大人しく寝ていられたらだけどね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that is if you can stay quietly in bed.\""},{"lineNumber":230950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう入ってもいいわよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can come in now.\""},{"lineNumber":230951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーーーーーーん！　レリコフーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaaaah! Relikov!\""},{"lineNumber":230952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ヒーローだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's Hero.\""},{"lineNumber":230953,"originalJapaneseLine":"どかーん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Boom!"},{"lineNumber":230954,"originalJapaneseLine":"テントを吹き飛ばしかねない勢いで","translatedEnglishLine":"With enough force to blow the tent away,"},{"lineNumber":230955,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヒーローが中に突っ込んでレリコフを抱きしめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero rushed inside and hugged Relikov."},{"lineNumber":230956,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":230957,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜バキボキグキバキボキボキ！＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Crunch crack snap crack snap!>"},{"lineNumber":230958,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あははは、痛いよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha, that hurts!\""},{"lineNumber":230959,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーん、もう！　心配したんだからねー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah, geez! I was so worried about you!\""},{"lineNumber":230960,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう！　もう！　レリコフの馬鹿ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Geez! Geez! You dummy, Relikov!\""},{"lineNumber":230961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あははは、痛いよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha, that hurts!\""},{"lineNumber":230962,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、ヒーロー。退場」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, Hero. Exit stage left.\""},{"lineNumber":230963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehhhh!?!\""},{"lineNumber":230964,"originalJapaneseLine":"「病室では静かにするって約束、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You broke your promise to be quiet in the hospital room,"},{"lineNumber":230965,"originalJapaneseLine":"　守れなかったのはそっちでしょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"that was your fault, wasn’t it?"},{"lineNumber":230966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はい、出てった出てった」","translatedEnglishLine":"Okay, get out, get out.\""},{"lineNumber":230967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーーーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":230968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うあおおおおお！　＜エール＞ーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uwaaaaah! <Yell>!!\""},{"lineNumber":230969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無事で良かった！　良かったよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm so glad you're safe! So glad!\""},{"lineNumber":230970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お二人ともご無事で何よりですだああああ！！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm so relieved that both of you are safe!!"},

{"lineNumber":230971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おーーーいおいおいおい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heeey hey hey hey!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんた、薬はちゃんと飲んだんでしょうね？」
「飲んだよ。
すっっっごく苦かったけど」
「そう、偉いじゃない」
「しかし、何をどうやったらあの熱が
一日でこれだけ下がるんだか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how does that fever drop this much in just one day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへー……」
「ん？　なに笑ってるのよ」
「優しいんだね……」
「はっ」
ミックスは鼻で笑った。
「人を助ける職業に就いてるのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I work in a profession that helps people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 医者が優しいなんて当然でしょーが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so of course doctors are kind."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとう、ミックスちゃん！」
「……おいこら、勝手にちゃん付けすんな」
「あー、はいはい」
「感謝の気持ちがあるんなら、
とっとと治ってあたしの手を煩わせないでよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then get well quickly and don't trouble me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 照れているわけでもないようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She didn't seem to be embarrassed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミックスは淡々とそう言った。
ぎろり。
あなたは睨まれてしまった。
あなたはカルテでバーンと顔を殴られた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were hit hard in the face with a medical chart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あによ？　なんか言った？」
どうやら怒らせてしまったようだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems you've made her angry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは首を横に振った。
「ったく……
無駄に元気有り余ってるわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have an excess of pointless energy, don't you...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、元気なら、それが何よりだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if you're energetic, that's the best thing after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわりと、ちゃんと見ていなければ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Softly, if you weren't looking carefully,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づかないほどさりげなく、
ミックスが微笑んだ。
「とりあえず二人とも今日は絶対安静。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, both of you must rest absolutely today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日、大人しくしていること」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stay quiet and calm for one day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、大人しく寝ていられたらだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that is if you can stay quietly in bed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう入ってもいいわよー」
「うわーーーーーーん！　レリコフーーー！」
「あ、ヒーローだ」
どかーん。
テントを吹き飛ばしかねない勢いで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With enough force to blow the tent away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローが中に突っ込んでレリコフを抱きしめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero rushed inside and hugged Relikov.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜バキボキグキバキボキボキ！＞
「あははは、痛いよー」
「うわーん、もう！　心配したんだからねー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah, geez! I was so worried about you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう！　もう！　レリコフの馬鹿ー！」
「あははは、痛いよー」
「はい、ヒーロー。退場」
「ええええっ！？」
「病室では静かにするって約束、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You broke your promise to be quiet in the hospital room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守れなかったのはそっちでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was your fault, wasn’t it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、出てった出てった」
「うわーーーーーん！」
「うあおおおおお！　＜エール＞ーーー！
無事で良かった！　良かったよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm so glad you're safe! So glad!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お二人ともご無事で何よりですだああああ！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm so relieved that both of you are safe!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おーーーいおいおいおい！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

「そう、偉いじゃない」

一日でこれだけ下がるんだか……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems you've made her angry.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if you're energetic, that's the best thing after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわりと、ちゃんと見ていなければ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Softly, if you weren't looking carefully,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づかないほどさりげなく、
ミックスが微笑んだ。
「とりあえず二人とも今日は絶対安静。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, both of you must rest absolutely today.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stay quiet and calm for one day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、大人しく寝ていられたらだけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that is if you can stay quietly in bed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう入ってもいいわよー」
「うわーーーーーーん！　レリコフーーー！」

どかーん。
テントを吹き飛ばしかねない勢いで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With enough force to blow the tent away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローが中に突っ込んでレリコフを抱きしめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero rushed inside and hugged Relikov.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜バキボキグキバキボキボキ！＞
「あははは、痛いよー」
「うわーん、もう！　心配したんだからねー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah, geez! I was so worried about you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう！　もう！　レリコフの馬鹿ー！」
「あははは、痛いよー」
「はい、ヒーロー。退場」
「ええええっ！？」
「病室では静かにするって約束、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You broke your promise to be quiet in the hospital room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守れなかったのはそっちでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was your fault, wasn’t it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、出てった出てった」
「うわーーーーーん！」
「うあおおおおお！　＜エール＞ーーー！
無事で良かった！　良かったよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm so glad you're safe! So glad!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お二人ともご無事で何よりですだああああ！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm so relieved that both of you are safe!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おーーーいおいおいおい！」
